strings: <voice_0x01000A85><se_def>*: I say, you there! Yes, you.

<voice_0x01000A86><se_def>*: Hello there! I'm the town's resident photographer. Cameron's the name.
Cameron Obscura.
<voice_0x01000A87><se_def>Cameron Obscura: I hope you don't mind me asking, but have you ever taken a photograph yourself?

<voice_0x01000A88><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Negative? Good grief, we can't have that!
Allow me to explain the process to you, then.
<voice_0x01000A89><se_def>Cameron Obscura: When you spot something you'd like to photograph, the first thing to do is press the START button. That lets you look through the lens, you see.

<voice_0x01000A8A><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Then you simply press the A button whilst
you're in shooting mode, and whatever you
see before you will be recorded in your album
for posterity.

<voice_0x01000A8B><se_def>Cameron Obscura: There are some other controls as well,
but rather than boring you with the details,
it might be better if you just give it a ‘shot’!
Learn on the job, as it were.

<voice_0x01000A8E><se_def>Cameron Obscura: You have? So you already know how to use
a camera? I suppose a seasoned traveller like
yourself would, yes.

<voice_0x01000A8F><se_def>Cameron Obscura: ...Which means you're aware that pressing the
START button allows you to look through
the lens.
<voice_0x01000A90><se_def>Cameron Obscura: ...And that taking a picture is a simple matter of pressing the A button.

<voice_0x01000A91><se_def>Cameron Obscura: That being the case, I hardly need tell you that each photograph is automatically added to your album <endash> what with you knowing already,
I mean.
<voice_0x01000A95><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Ready to show me the fruits of your labours, eh? Come along then, let's have a closer look...

<voice_0x01000A96><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Hmm, not bad. Not bad at all.
I was right about you, I see.
You have a fine eye.
<voice_0x01000A97><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Do you know, it's a little hobby of mine to collect photos of singular sights from around the world.

<voice_0x01000A9A><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Oh, please understand, I'm not asking you to
go out of your way <endash> just to come and see me
whenever you're passing through.
<voice_0x01000A9B><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Please, I beg you to reconsider. If you could just see your way to showing me your photos when you're in town, I'll make it worth your while.
<voice_0x01000A9C><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Please, do me this one small favour. Photography is my life! Your pictures may be my only hope of seeing the world's remaining wonders!

<voice_0x01000A9D><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Oh, that's splendid!
In that case, let me give you this...
<IF_SOLO><Cap><leader><ELSE_NOT_SOLO>The party<ENDIF_SOLO> receives Cameron's Challenge Codex!
The contents of the book are accessible from the Misc. menu.
<voice_0x01000A9E><se_def>Cameron Obscura: I'll use that book to set you photographic challenges <endash> quests to find special places and unusual monsters from around the world.
<voice_0x01000A9F><se_def>Cameron Obscura: If you manage to take a picture of the quest subject, you may rest assured that I will reward you accordingly.
<voice_0x01000AA0><se_def>Cameron Obscura: I've actually prepared a little practice challenge to start you off. Let's see if you're eagle-eyed enough to take the picture I'm after.
<voice_0x01000AA1><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Just come back and show me when you've got it, all right? Well, happy snapping, and good luck!
<voice_0x01000A8C><se_def>Cameron Obscura: I tell you what, why not take a picture of my good self? Then we can see if you've got the hang of it or not.

<voice_0x01000A8D><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Once you're happy you've captured me in all my glory, let me have a look and I'll tell you what
I think.
<voice_0x01000A93><se_def>Cameron Obscura: I'd be very interested to see how good a photographer you are. Perhaps you would indulge me by taking my picture?
<voice_0x01000A94><se_def>Cameron Obscura: Once you're happy you've captured my true essence, let me have a look and I'll give you my professional opinion.
<voice_0x01000A98><se_def>Cameron Obscura: I used to travel a lot, you see. But it's become so dangerous, I don't dare venture very far these days. I really do miss it, though.
<voice_0x01000A99><se_def>Cameron Obscura: And so I was wondering if you might take some pictures while you're off on your travels, and come back and show me every now and then?
<voice_0x01000A92><se_def>Cameron Obscura: I wonder if I might ask you a little favour, actually...
